attributes.action: Require Builders to be Licensed and Governed by a Regulatory Body
attributes.additional_details:
Mandate that failure to complete work to standards set by building control will result in loss of their license.
Require all builders and tradespeople to have indemnity insurance to protect consumers from Rogue Traders shutting down leaving them unable to claim money back.
Protect the public and consumers from cowboy builders and tradespeople, financial devastation, and from their homes being damaged and destroyed by unqualified tradespeople and con artists.
attributes.background: Require all builders and tradespersons to be regulated by a governing body who have the power to investigate complaints, enforce remedies including reimbursement to the consumer, and force financial penalties, demand retraining, and require that all trades abide by a code of practice.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622130
